Documentation

data Move

Types of moves the player can make.

Constructors

Set String String String

Set square, provides coordinates and new value.

Check

Check board.

Erase String String

Erase square, provides coordinates.

Reset

Reset board.

Quit

Quit game.

data MoveError

Kinds of move errors that can occur.

Constructors

NaNError String

Provided value is not a number.

OutOfBoundsError Int Int

Provided location is out of bounds.

InvalidValueError Int

Provided value is invalid.

InvalidBoardError [Location]

Returned locations are invalid.

QuitError

Asked to quit game.

OtherError String

Other error not described above.

Instances

Show MoveError

What each error shows when it occurs.

Error MoveError

Error for a MoveError. This shouldn't happen.
